synopsis.text:
They call her the Angel of Death, a ruthless assassin who executes her targets with a graceful dance, leaving only a trail of feathers behind. But unbeknownst to the city's residents, this notorious killer is actually a shy and clumsy high school student named Monaka Noguchi. With her father working as an astronaut, Monaka lives a double life, balancing school, her part-time job as a waitress, and her secret assassin duties. Despite her timid nature, Monaka becomes a cold and calculating killer when she receives an assignment.

Years ago, another killer named Sawa vanished after avenging her parents' death. Now, Monaka carries on the legacy of the Angel of Death, taking down the city's worst criminals. But when her father's space mission goes awry, an unexpected evil descends upon the city. As the Angel of Death, Monaka must face her toughest challenge yet, one that will test her resolve and hit close to home. Will she be able to protect her city and those she loves, or will the monster from the space station prove to be her downfall? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
